sdata.j: |↑幾度|↑↓いくど↓も↑読↑↓よ↓んでみて↑初↑↓はじ↓めてその↑詩↑↓し↓のよさが↑分↑↓わ↓かる。
sdata.e: You cannot appreciate the poem until you have read it many times.

sdata.e: In high school, I won the Osaka and Kinki championships in cross-country skiing and Nordic combined skiing on countless occasions.
